ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Serious Everquest question, please help
ygData.msgSnippet: It all depends on how long you stayed online after you died. I can t remember the exact time... I ll have to ask. luv, -Su Next question, it has now been a
ygData.messageBody:
It all depends on how long you stayed online after you died.
I can't remember the exact time...
I'll have to ask.
luv,
-Su


Next question, it has now been a day, like our day, will my old corpse sitll
be there?

Sorry again for the basic questions but as a beginner, I just don't
uderstand it all

Thanks
----- Original Message -----
From: Pat Harrison
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, January 06, 2002 11:43 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Serious Everquest question, please help


I've had this happen to me as well. It's NOT possible for others to loot
or drag your corpse unless you give them permission using the /consent
command.

More likely what's happened is that your corpse is inside a tree or object
or even slightly underground. If you have the /loc where you died, stand
there and use the /corpse command which will summon it to you (if you're
close enough). If you don't know where it is, try gaining the help of a
necromancer or bard, they have the ability to locate corpses.

You can also buy a Chipped Bone Rod in Felwithe (I don't remember which
shop, sorry), when used, this item will point you towards the closest corpse
you have in the zone you're in. You can then run in that direction until
you get close enough to summon it with /corpse.
----- Original Message -----
From: Minigamer
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, January 06, 2002 7:39 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Serious Everquest question, please help


Hi all,

Forgive my ignorance but I am a newbie had a 4th level Druid in the city
of Elves and while out at the Orc Camp, with others, I got killed by an Orc
Centurian and when I returned to get my corpse, nothing was there. It was
not more than 4 minutes when I returned.

Question: Is it possible for someone to Steal or Loot my corpse? The
book says no but I beg to differ.
Is it possible that I had two corpses out there? Meaning, When I went
back with a dead body I died again? Which meant I found the wrong corpse?

And to add one last question, "what do I do now? seeing as I have no
food, no money, no nothing?" Do I beg or do I start another char?
This game is totally fun but with the fact of trying to learn which way
to go all the time and dying, it is starting to get to me,
I don't want to give up just yet and I turned to this board since the
Chat from the game options was USELESS.

Please help and Thanks in advance

Rob
